divs: Sighting DetailsThese are photographs taken by my wife's friend taken in Northern Oregon I believe. She is not a big believer in UFOligy but I am, and when I saw the photographs I asked if I could have them. My wife got them from her friend for me. To me it looks like a fleet flying in formation and are cloaked in clouds. I want to know if there have been other reports such as this, and if it is a known technology possesed by the ETI's (ability to create and memic movement of clouds as a disquise) or if this is more commonly known to be used by the ARV's? Or is this just a phenomenon recorded and understood as a cloud formation in our atmosphere to date? I appreciate any feedback or speculation you may have.
Summary: V shaped fleet with two craft bringing up the tail flying in formation, but cloaked in clouds?
